ack.p: Thanks to Linda Masters, John Balaban, Jane Balaban, Steve Apfelbaum, Alan Haney, Laurel Ross, Karen Rodriguez, Robbie Sliwinski, Eriko Kojima, and Sai Ramakrishna for their help collecting vegetation data and to John Taft and the Forest Preserves of Cook County staff for comments and advice on this manuscript. We are grateful to Brian von Dohlen for statistical advice. Many thanks to the Forest Preserves of Cook County, the North Branch Restoration Project, and the Somme volunteers for their ongoing land stewardship and support of this work.
